page.title: 02Recreation in Sidcup.
page.content: Many recreational facilities are available in the Sidcup District: An indoor{swimming pool}at Lamorbey, {pitch & putt}and putting green at Sidcup Place.{Private playing fields at the Cray Football Club and Sidcup Sports Club/Squash Club.{Tennis courts are available in parks throughout the area. A range of activities are available at{Footscray Outdoor Centre, including camping and there is a {cinema}in Sidcup High Street.There are several local lending{libraries including a mobile one at Haversham Road on Friday mornings. {Public halls}for hire range from Chis & Sid Grammar Schools' hall, seating 374, through 2 more school halls and 3 private halls (all seating approx 100) to small Church halls etc: There are{Youth Centres}at Lamorbey, Royal Park and Footscray.
